TextEng: I am in need of healing.
Do you have any healing or clerical supplies that you could sell?
Text: 팔 수 있는 치유나 성직자 용품이 있어?

TextEng: Could I ask you some questions?
You have supplies and stuff to sell?
Tell me about what's going on in Luskan.
Text: 러스칸에서 무슨 일이 벌어지고 있는지 말해줘.

TextEng: Tell me what goes on in city.
What is all the fighting about?
Do you know of any cults active in the city?
Text: 도시에서 활동 중인 사교 조직에 대해 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: Is there no one who can stop all the fighting?
Text: 싸움을 멈출 수 있는 사람은 아무도 없어?

TextEng: You knows about cults here, maybe?
Why do you think that is?
Can I see what you have?

Text: 너 가진 거 볼 수 있어?

TextEng: What kind of authorization do you need?
Uhh... what I needs to cross?
I'll cross the bridge if I like.
Me crosses if me wants to!
I have a pass right here. I am an ambassador from Mulhorand.
Text: 여기 통행증 있어. 난 멀호란드의 대사야.

TextEng: Me has pass. Me is ambassador of Mulhorand.
Text: 나 통행증 있어. 나 멀호란드 대사야.

TextEng: Surely there must be some other way across?
Text: 분명 건널 수 있는 다른 방법이 있을 텐데?

TextEng: There must be other way to goes there.
Text: 거기 갈 다른 방법 있을 거야.

TextEng: How do you get such a thing?
I have been told that you dislike Baram and Kurth.
What children? What are you talking about?
You stands back! Me bets they do somethings to you!
Text: 너 뒤로 물러나! 아마 너한테 뭔가 한 거야!

TextEng: You be calm. Me frees you from cocoon.
Stand back! I can just imagine what's been done to you!
Text: 뒤로 물러나! 네게 무슨 짓을 했을지 상상도 가는군!

TextEng: Who are you? How did this happen?
Calm down. I freed you from this cocoon.
You wants me to take you to Londa?
Me has better things to do.
Can you make it out of here?
Do you wish me to take you back to Londa?
Forget it. I have other things to do.
Is there anything else up there?
Me be <FullName>, hero of Neverwinter. You need give me gold so me can buy stuff.
Text: 나는 네버윈터의 영웅 <FullName>이야. 나 물건 사려면 금화 줘야 해.

TextEng: I'm <FullName>, hero of Neverwinter. You have to give me gold so I can buy some equipment.
Text: 저는 네버윈터의 영웅 <FullName>입니다. 장비를 사려면 금화를 주셔야 해요.

TextEng: Okay, you just forget me say anything about this.
Text: 좋아, 그냥 내가 한 말 다 잊어.
좋아요, 제가 말한 거 다 잊어주세요.

TextEng: You give me 50 gold or me gonna get you demoted!
Text: 금화 50개 줘, 안 그러면 강등시킬 거야!

TextEng: Hand over 50 gold or I'll have you demoted!
Text: 금화 50개 내놔, 안 그러면 강등시킬 거야!

TextEng: <StartAction>Put an imp's eye in the flames.</Start>
<StartAction>Put a quasit's eye in the flames.</Start>
<StartAction>Put a piece of rubble in the flames.</Start>
<StartAction>Put the Golem Replication Rod into a depression.</Start>
<StartAction>Put the Golem Control Rod into a depression.</Start>
Do not enter the portal at this time.
<StartAction>Put the glowing sphere in the portal.</Start>
<StartAction>Put the smooth token in the portal.</Start>
<StartAction>Put a random object in the portal.</Start>
This you enclave? It pretty pathetic.
So this is your enclave? Impressive. No, really.
Text: 그래서 이게 너희 엔클레이브야? 인상적인데. 진심이야.

TextEng: Let me see what you have.
